|vo_04_03_tx_s       = 想吃猎鹿人餐馆的香辣鲈鱼…可是最近的肚子，呜…

|vo_05_01_title_s    = 关于{name_s}自己…
|vo_05_01_title_t    = 關於{name_t}自己…
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character}.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx_s       = 「指引我前进的风啊。在我困顿时给我继续前行的力量，在我迷惑时给我辨明善恶的智慧，在我遭受不义时给我抗争的勇气…」…哎呀，抱歉，刚才在专心祈祷。有什么事吗？
|vo_05_01_tx_t       = 「指引我前進的風啊。在我困頓時給我繼續前行的力量，在我迷惑時給我辨明善惡的智慧，在我遭受不義時給我抗爭的勇氣…」…哎呀，抱歉，剛才在專心祈禱。有什麼事嗎？
|vo_05_01_rm         = "Zhǐyǐn wǒ qiánjìn de fēng a. Zài wǒ kùndùn shí gěi wǒ jìxù qiánxíng de lìliàng, zài wǒ míhuò shí gěi wǒ biànmíng shàn'è de zhìhuì, zài wǒ zāoshòu bùyì shí gěi wǒ kàngzhēng de yǒngqì..." ...Āiya, bàoqiàn, gāngcái zài zhuānxīn qídǎo. Yǒu shénme shì ma?
|vo_05_01_tl         = "The wind that guides me onward, grant me the strength to move forward in my distress, grant me the wisdom to discern good and evil in my confusion, grant me the courage of resistance when faced with injustice..." Ah, my apologies, I was focused in prayer. Is anything the matter?
|vo_06_01_title_s    = 关于我们・愿望
|vo_06_01_title_t    = 關於我們・願望
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Hopes
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Hopes.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx_s       = 我的愿望，是给身边的大家带来笑容！只要能帮上你的忙，我就很开心了。
|vo_06_01_tx_t       = 我的願望，是給身邊的大家帶來笑容！只要能幫上（你/妳）的忙，我就很開心了。
|vo_06_01_rm         = Wǒ de yuànwàng, shì gěi shēnbiān de dàjiā dàilái xiàoróng! Zhǐyào néng bāngshàng nǐ de máng, wǒ jiù hěn kāixīnle.
|vo_06_01_tl         = My wish is to bring smiles to everyone around me! As long as I can help you out, I'm already very happy.
|vo_06_02_title_s    = 关于我们・梦想
|vo_06_02_title_t    = 關於我們・夢想
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Dreams
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Dreams.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx_s       = 谢谢你陪我走到现在，离我的梦想已经越来越近了呢。未来的日子，也请多多关照啦~！
|vo_06_02_tx_t       = 謝謝（你/妳）陪我走到現在，離我的夢想已經越來越近了呢。未來的日子，也請多多關照啦~！
|vo_06_02_rm         = Xièxie nǐ péi wǒ zǒu dào xiànzài, lí wǒ de mèngxiǎng yǐjīng yuè lái yuè jìnle ne. Wèilái de rìzi, yě qǐng duōduō guānzhào la~!
|vo_06_02_tl         = Thank you for accompanying me in this journey so far, I'm getting closer and closer to my dreams. Please look after me in the days to come as well!
|vo_07_01_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 每个人都会有自己的愿望。汇聚大家的愿望，让大家感到幸福，这一定，就是神给予我的使命吧。
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 每個人都會有自己的願望。匯聚大家的願望，讓大家感到幸福，這一定，就是神給予我的使命吧。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Měigèrén dōuhuì yǒu zìjǐ de yuànwàng. Huìjù dàjiā de yuànwàng, ràng dàjiā gǎndào xìngfú, zhè yīdìng, jiùshì shén jǐyǔ wǒ de shǐmìng ba.
|vo_07_01_tl         = Everyone has their own wishes. Gathering everyone's wishes, bringing happiness to everyone, this must be the mission that the Gods have given me.
|vo_07_02_title_s    = 有什么想要分享…
|vo_07_02_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享…
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx_s       = 蒙德城外青青的原野，真的百看不厌。但我听说，世界上还有蓝色的树林呢！就在海对岸的稻妻城那边。嗯！我还得多攒一点…欸？问我在攒什么？嘿嘿，是秘密哦~！
|vo_07_02_tx_t       = 蒙德城外青青的原野，真的百看不厭。但我聽說，世界上還有藍色的樹林呢！就在海對岸的稻妻城那邊。嗯！我還得多存一點…欸？問我在存什麼？嘿嘿，是秘密哦~！
|vo_07_02_rm         = Méngdé-chéng wài qīngqīng de yuányě, zhēnde bǎikànbùyàn. Dàn wǒ tīngshuō, shìjiè shàng hái yǒu lánsè de shùlín ne! Jiù zài hǎiduì'àn de Dàoqī-chéng nàbiān. Ǹg! Wǒ hái děi duō zǎn yīdiǎn... Ei? Wèn wǒ zài zǎn shénme? Hēihei, shì mìmì o~!
|vo_07_02_tl         = I never tire of seeing the green fields outside of Mondstadt City. But I've heard that there are also blue forests in this world! Right across the sea near Inazuma City. Mmm! I still have to save up a little more... Eh? You're asking me what I'm saving? Hehe, it's a secret!
|vo_07_03_title_s    = 感兴趣的见闻…
|vo_07_03_title_t    = 感興趣的見聞…
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx_s       = 向日葵一直对着阳光的样子，很耀眼呢。其实，妈妈送过我一条向日葵风格的礼裙…但我什么时候才能穿上它去演出呢？
|vo_07_03_tx_t       = 向日葵一直對著陽光的樣子，很耀眼呢。其實，媽媽送過我一條向日葵風格的禮裙…但我什麼時候才能穿上它去演出呢？
|vo_07_03_rm         = Xiàngrìkuí yīzhí duìzhe yángguāng de yàngzi, hěn yàoyǎn ne. Qíshí, māma sòngguò wǒ yītiáo xiàngrìkuí fēnggé de lǐqún... Dàn wǒ shénme shíhòu cáinéng chuān shàng tā qù yǎnchū ne?
|vo_07_03_tl         = The way sunflowers always face the sun, it's a very dazzling sight. Actually, Mother once gifted me a dress styled with sunflowers... But when will I be able to wear it to perform?
|vo_08_01_title_s    = 关于琴…
|vo_08_01_title_t    = 關於琴…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Jean]]
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Jean.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx_s       = 代理团长大人…骑士团的领袖，大家都很喜欢她哦。欸？问我吗？我…我当然也非常尊敬她！
|vo_08_01_tx_t       = 代理團長大人…騎士團的領袖，大家都很喜歡她哦。欸？問我嗎？我…我當然也非常尊敬她！
|vo_08_01_rm         = Dàilǐ Tuánzhǎng-dàrén... Qíshìtuán de lǐngxiù, dàjiā dōu hěn xǐhuān tā o. Ei? Wèn wǒ ma? Wǒ... wǒ dāngrán yě fēicháng zūnjìng tā!
|vo_08_01_tl         = The Acting Grand Master... The leader of the Knights, everyone really likes her. Eh? You're asking me? I... Of course I also respect her very much!
|vo_08_02_title_s    = 关于丽莎…
|vo_08_02_title_t    = 關於麗莎…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Lisa]]
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Lisa.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx_s       = 我一直承蒙丽莎姐姐照顾呢。要是她也成为偶像的话，我绝对会全力应援，喊到嗓子哑掉…啊，这样会吓到别人的吧…
|vo_08_02_tx_t       = 我一直承蒙麗莎姐姐照顧呢。要是她也成為偶像的話，我絕對會全力應援，喊到嗓子啞掉…啊，這樣會嚇到別人的吧…
|vo_08_02_rm         = Wǒ yīzhí chéngméng Lìshā-jiějie zhàogù ne. Yàoshi tā yě chéngwéi ǒuxiàng de huà, wǒ juéduì huì quánlì yìngyuán, hǎn dào sǎngzi yǎdiào... A, zhèyàng huì xià dào biérén de ba...
|vo_08_02_tl         = I've always been under the care of Lisa. If she were to become an idol, I will definitely cheer her on with all of my energy, and shout until my voice becomes hoarse... Ah, I might scare other people like this...
|vo_08_03_title_s    = 关于安柏…
|vo_08_03_title_t    = 關於安柏…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Amber]]
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Amber.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 以前就经常看到安柏风风火火地往城外跑，侦察骑士还真是辛苦呀。
|vo_08_03_tx_t       = 以前就經常看到安柏風風火火地往城外跑，偵察騎士還真是辛苦呀。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Yǐqián jiù jīngcháng kàndào Ānbó fēngfēnghuǒhuǒ de wǎng chéngwài pǎo, Zhēnchá-qíshì hái zhēnshi xīnkǔ ya.
|vo_08_03_tl         = In the past, I've often seen Amber rushing out of the city in a great hurry. It must be tough to be an Outrider.
|vo_08_04_title_s    = 关于迪卢克…
|vo_08_04_title_t    = 關於迪盧克…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About [[Diluc]]
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Diluc.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 迪卢克老爷吗？上次在「天使的馈赠」演出，他一直皱着眉头…是不是我唱的歌他不喜欢呢？
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 迪盧克老爺嗎？上次在「天使的饋贈」演出，他一直皺著眉頭…是不是我唱的歌他不喜歡呢？
|vo_08_04_rm         = Dílúkè Lǎoyé ma? Shàngcì zài "Tiānshǐ de Kuìzèng" yǎnchū, tā yīzhí zhòuzhe méitóu... Shìbushì wǒ chàng de gē tā bùxǐhuān ne?
|vo_08_04_tl         = Master Diluc? The last time I was performing at the "Angel's Share," he was furrowing his brows the whole time...was it that he doesn't like my singing?
|vo_08_05_title_s    = 关于温迪…
|vo_08_05_title_t    = 關於溫迪…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About [[Venti]]
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Venti.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx_s       = 温迪的声音很好听！不过，他唱的歌跟我擅长的风格差异很大。我试着偷偷学过…那旋律还真是复杂呀。
|vo_08_05_tx_t       = 溫迪的聲音很好聽！不過，他唱的歌跟我擅長的風格差異很大。我試著偷偷學過…那旋律還真是複雜呀。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Wēndí de shēngyīn hěn hǎotīng! Bùguò, tā chàng de gē gēn wǒ shàncháng de fēnggé chāyì hěn dà. Wǒ shìzhe tōutōu xuéguò... Nà xuánlǜ hái zhēnshi fùzá ya.
|vo_08_05_tl         = Venti's voice is so nice! Although, the songs he sings versus the songs I'm good at have a big gap in style. I secretly tried learning once...the melody was really complicated.
|vo_08_06_title_s    = 关于班尼特…
|vo_08_06_title_t    = 關於班尼特…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Bennett]]
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Bennett.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx_s       = 班尼特经常带着一身伤痕来教堂…他却一直毫不在意、大大咧咧地笑着。唔…还是应该更爱惜自己才好啊。
|vo_08_06_tx_t       = 班尼特經常帶著一身傷痕來教堂…他卻一直毫不在意、大大咧咧地笑著。唔…還是應該更愛惜自己才好啊。
|vo_08_06_rm_s       = Bānnítè jīngcháng dài zhe yīshēn shānghén lái jiàotáng... Tā què yīzhí háo bù zàiyì, dàdaliēliě de xiàozhe. Wu... háishì yīnggāi gèng àixī zìjǐ cái hǎo a.
|vo_08_06_rm_t       = Bānnítè jīngcháng dài zhe yīshēn shānghén lái jiàotáng... Tā què yīzhí háo bù zàiyì, dàdaliēliě de xiàozhe. Wu... háishì yīnggāi gèng àixí zìjǐ cái hǎo a.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Bennett always arrives at the Cathedral with a body full of wounds... But he doesn't mind it in the slightest, always laughing heartily. Huh... It's always good to take care of yourself.
|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于法尔伽…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於法爾伽…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Varka]]
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Varka.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 父亲跟着法尔伽大团长一起出远门了，也不知道路途中会不会遇到什么…啊，没关系，大团长可是「北风骑士」，一定没问题的！我…也会为他们祈祷的。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = 父親跟著法爾伽大團長一起出遠門了，也不知道路途中會不會遇到什麼…啊，沒關係，大團長可是「北風騎士」，一定沒問題的！我…也會為他們祈禱的。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Fùqīn gēnzhe Fǎěrjiā Dà-tuánzhǎng yīqǐ chūyuǎnménle, yě bùzhīdào lùtú zhōng huìbuhuì yùdào shénme... A, méiguānxì, Dà-tuánzháng kěshì "Běifēng Qíshì", yīdìng méiwèntí de! Wǒ... yě huì wèi tāmen qídǎo de.
|vo_08_07_tl         = Father left to accompany Grand Master Varka on a long journey, I also don't know if they might encounter anything along the way... Ah, no worries, the Grand Master is the "Boreas Knight," there's definitely no problem! I... will also keep them in prayer.
|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于罗莎莉亚…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於蘿莎莉亞…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Rosaria]]
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Rosaria.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 罗莎莉亚修女虽然难以接近，也从不参加祈祷，但我觉得…唔，她一定是相信着风神的！不过，不过我并没有勇气和她交流就是了…
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 蘿莎莉亞修女雖然難以接近，也從不參加祈禱，但我覺得…唔，她一定是相信著風神的！不過，不過我並沒有勇氣和她交流就是了…
|vo_08_08_rm_s       = Luóshālìyà-xiūnǚ suīrán nán yǐ jiējìn, yě cóng bù cānjiā qídǎo, dàn wǒ juédé... Wu, tā yīdìng shì xiāngxìn zhe Fēngshén de! Bùguò, bùguò wǒ bìng méiyǒu yǒngqì hé tā jiāoliú jiùshìle...
|vo_08_08_rm_t       = Luóshālìyà-xiūnǚ suīrán nán yǐ jiējìn, yě cóng bù cānjiā qídǎo, dàn wǒ juédé... Wu, tā yīdìng shì xiāngxìn zhe Fēngshén de! Bùguò, bùguò wǒ bìng méiyǒu yǒngqì hàn tā jiāoliú jiùshìle...
|vo_08_08_tl         = Although Sister Rosaria is hard to approach, and never joins the prayers, but I feel... She must believe in the Anemo Archon! However, I don't have the courage to interact with her...
|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于诺艾尔…
|vo_08_09_title_t    = 關於諾艾爾…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Noelle]]
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Noelle.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 诺艾尔实在是太可爱了！人又温柔，还很有耐心，跟她在一起的时候，完全不会有什么压力…哦，对了，她做的茶点也很特别。又香，又甜，而且很健康，嘿嘿。
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 諾艾爾實在是太可愛了！人又溫柔，還很有耐心，跟她在一起的時候，完全不會有什麼壓力…哦，對了，她做的茶點也很特別。又香，又甜，而且很健康，嘿嘿。
|vo_08_09_rm         = Nuò'ài'ěr shízài shì tài kě'àile! Rén yòu wēnróu, hái hěn yǒu nàixīn, gēn tā zàiyīqǐ de shíhòu, wánquán bù huì yǒu shénme yālì... O, duìle, tā zuò de chádiǎn yě hěn tèbié. Yòu xiāng, yòu tián, érqiě hěn jiànkāng, hēihei.
|vo_08_09_tl         = Noelle is really too cute! She's gentle and so patient, when I'm with her, I don't feel any pressure at all... Oh, right, the refreshments she makes are also very special. Fragrant and sweet, and also very healthy. Hehe.
|vo_09_01_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其一
|vo_09_01_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其一
|vo_09_01_subtitle   = More About {character}: I
|vo_09_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_09_01_tx_s       = 骑士们挥剑作战的样子好帅啊！你是不是也有这种感觉？我自己也试过用剑…欸嘿嘿，可惜我在剑术上，完全没有天赋呢。
|vo_09_01_tx_t       = 騎士們揮劍作戰的樣子好帥啊！（你/妳）是不是也有這種感覺？我自己也試過用劍…欸嘿嘿，可惜我在劍術上，完全沒有天賦呢。
|vo_09_01_rm         = Qíshìmen huījiàn zuòzhàn de yàngzi hǎo shuài a! Nǐ shìbushì yě yǒu zhèzhǒng gǎnjué? Wǒ zìjǐ yě shìguò yòng jiàn... Eihēihēi, kěxí wǒ zài jiànshù shàng, wánquán méiyǒu tiānfù ne.
|vo_09_01_tl         = The way the Knights wield their swords and engage in combat is so cool! Do you also feel like this? I've also tried using a sword myself... Ehehe, it's too bad that I don't have any talent in swordsmanship.
|vo_09_02_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其二
|vo_09_02_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其二
|vo_09_02_subtitle   = More About {character}: II
|vo_09_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_09_02_tx_s       = 想要治愈大家。就是这么简单的心情，让我成为了牧师。要是能帮上大家就好了。
|vo_09_02_tx_t       = 想要治癒大家。就是這麼簡單的心情，讓我成為了牧師。要是能幫上大家就好了。
|vo_09_02_rm         = Xiǎng yào zhìyù dàjiā. Jiùshì zhème jiǎndān de xīnqíng, ràng wǒ chéngwéile mùshī. Yàoshi néng bāngshàng dàjiā jiù hǎole.
|vo_09_02_tl         = I want to heal everyone. It's this simple emotion that pushed me to become a Deaconness. It would be nice if I can help everyone.
|vo_09_03_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其三
|vo_09_03_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其三
|vo_09_03_subtitle   = More About {character}: III
|vo_09_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_09_03_tx_s       = 偶像，唔{{sic|...|hide=1}}是从艾莉丝那边了解到的…「优秀的偶像能够治愈人们的心灵。」嗯，嗯，总之就是这样啦。
|vo_09_03_tx_t       = 偶像，唔…是從艾莉絲那邊瞭解到的…「優秀的偶像能夠治癒人們的心靈。」嗯，嗯，總之就是這樣啦。
|vo_09_03_rm         = Ǒuxiàng, wú... Shì cóng Àilìsī nàbiān liǎojiě dào de... "Yōuxiù de ǒuxiàng nénggòu zhìyù rénmen de xīnlíng." Ǹg, ǹg, zǒngzhī jiùshì zhèyàng la.
|vo_09_03_tl         = Idol, huh... I learned about them from Alice. "Excellent idols can heal the hearts of others." Mmm, it's like this, anyway.
|vo_09_04_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其四
|vo_09_04_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其四
|vo_09_04_subtitle   = More About {character}: IV
|vo_09_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_09_04_tx_s       = 我每天都在努力，这份努力…如果能配得上蒙德城大家的信任…
|vo_09_04_tx_t       = 我每天都在努力，這份努力…如果能配得上蒙德城大家的信任…
|vo_09_04_rm         = Wǒ měitiān dōu zài nǔlì, zhè fèn nǔlì... Rúguǒ néng pèidéshàng Méngdé-chéng dàjiā de xìnrèn...
|vo_09_04_tl         = I am working hard everyday. This effort... If it can be worthy of the trust of everyone in Mondstadt...
|vo_09_05_title_s    = 想要了解{name_s}・其五
|vo_09_05_title_t    = 想要瞭解{name_t}・其五
|vo_09_05_subtitle   = More About {character}: V
|vo_09_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_09_05_tx_s       = 每次演出的时候我都会想…我真的能够治愈蒙德城里的每个人么？但是看着你，我总觉得只要一步步向前，总有一天…欸？至少已经把你治愈了…？这时候不是应该说！我已经治愈很多人了吗？！不过这样也不错…
|vo_09_05_tx_t       = 每次演出的時候我都會想…我真的能夠治癒蒙德城裡的每個人嗎？但是看著（你/妳），我總覺得只要一步步向前，總有一天…欸？至少已經把（你/妳）治癒了…？這時候不是應該說！我已經治癒很多人了嗎？！不過這樣也不錯…
|vo_09_05_rm         = Měicì yǎnchū de shíhòu wǒ dōuhuì xiǎng... Wǒ zhēnde nénggòu zhìyù Méngdé-chéng lǐ de měigèrén me? Dànshì kànzhe nǐ, wǒ zǒng juédé zhǐyào yībùbù xiàngqián, zǒngyǒu yītiān... Ei? Zhìshǎo yǐjīng bǎ nǐ zhìyùle...? Zhè shíhòu bùshì yīnggāi shuō! Wǒ yǐjīng zhìyù hěnduō rénle ma?! Bùguò zhèyàng yě bùcuò...
|vo_09_05_tl         = Every time I perform I always wonder... Am I really able to heal everyone in Mondstadt City? But when I look at you, I feel like as long as I keep moving forward step by step, one day... Huh? At least I've already healed you...? Shouldn't you be saying that I've already healed a lot of people?! But, this isn't too bad either...
|vo_10_01_title_s    = {name_s}的爱好…
|vo_10_01_title_t    = {name_t}的愛好…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 是大家脸上的笑容，一直在支持我。
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = 是大家臉上的笑容，一直在支持我。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Shì dàjiā liǎnshàng de xiàoróng, yīzhí zài zhīchí wǒ.
|vo_10_01_tl         = It is the smile on everyone's faces, that has continously cheered me on.
|vo_10_02_title_s    = {name_s}的烦恼…
|vo_10_02_title_t    = {name_t}的煩惱…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx_s       = 同伴们一直在受伤…我，没有替大家分担痛苦的力量。但我可以尽最大的努力治疗！一定，要让大家恢复健康。
|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 同伴們一直在受傷…我，沒有替大家分擔痛苦的力量。但我可以盡最大的努力治療！一定，要讓大家恢復健康。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Tóngbànmen yīzhí zài shòushāng... Wǒ, méiyǒu tì dàjiā fēndān tòngkǔ de lìliàng. Dàn wǒ kěyǐ jǐn zuìdà de nǔlì zhìliáo! Yīdìng, yào ràng dàjiā huīfù jiànkāng.
|vo_10_02_tl         = My friends are always getting hurt... I don't have the ability to share in shouldering this pain. But I can do my very best to heal! I will definitely restore everyone to their fullest health.
|vo_10_03_title_s    = 喜欢的食物…
|vo_10_03_title_t    = 喜歡的食物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx_s       = 你喜欢麻辣小鱼干吗？我这还有两条…喏，给你一条！
|vo_10_03_tx_t       = （你/妳）喜歡麻辣小魚乾嗎？我這還有兩條…喏，給（你/妳）一條！
|vo_10_03_rm         = Nǐ xǐhuān málà-xiǎoyúgàn ma? Wǒ zhè háiyǒu liǎng tiáo... Nuo, gěi nǐ yī tiáo!
|vo_10_03_tl         = Do you like spicy dried fish? I still have two pieces here... Here's one for you!

|vo_10_04_title_t    = 討厭的食物…

|vo_10_04_tx_s       = 我不太喜欢苦的东西，特别是…苦瓜。

|vo_10_04_rm         = Wǒ bùtài xǐhuān kǔ de dōngxī, tèbié shì... kǔguā.
|vo_10_04_tl         = I don't particularly like bitter things, especially... bitter gourd.

|vo_11_01_rm         = Hěnshǎo chī dào nàme hé wǒ kǒuwèi de càiyáo. Jīntiān shì xìngyùn-rì ne!
|vo_11_01_tl         = I rarely get to eat a dish that suits my personal tastes so much. Today is a lucky day!

|vo_12_01_title_s    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_title_t    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx_s       = 请收下！这个是给你的生日礼物，专属签名绘哟~欸嘿，等下一首新歌，我会第一时间唱给你听的！生日快乐呀！
|vo_12_01_tx_t       = 請收下！這個是給（你/妳）的生日禮物，專屬簽名繪喲~欸嘿，等下一首新歌，我會第一時間唱給（你/妳）聽的！生日快樂呀！
|vo_12_01_rm         = Qǐng shōuxià! Zhège shì gěinǐ de shēngrì lǐwù, zhuānshǔ qiānmínghuì yo~ Eihei, děngxià yī shǒu xīngē, wǒ huì dìyīshíjiān chàng gěi nǐ tīng de! Shēngrì kuàilè ya!
|vo_12_01_tl         = Please accept this! This is a birthday present for you, a special autograph~ Ehe, the next time I come up with a new song, I will sing it for you as soon as I can! Happy birthday!
|vo_13_01_title_s    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_title_t    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx_s       = 芭芭拉的舞步…治愈力UP！
|vo_13_01_tx_t       = 芭芭拉的舞步…治癒力UP！
|vo_13_01_rm         = Bābālā de wǔbù... Zhìyùlì UP!
|vo_13_01_tl         = Barbara's dance steps... Healing power UP!
|vo_13_02_title_s    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_title_t    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx_s       = 谢谢你的支持~啊，不好，好像有点太激动了…心脏怦怦跳个不停。
|vo_13_02_tx_t       = 謝謝（你/妳）的支持~啊，不好，好像有點太激動了…心臟怦怦跳個不停。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Xièxiè nǐ de zhīchí~ A, bùhǎo, hǎoxiàng yǒudiǎn tài jīdòngle... Xīnzàng pēngpeng tiào gè bùtíng.
|vo_13_02_tl         = Thank you for your support~ Ah, oh no, it seems I'm a little too excited... My heart is beating so fast.
|vo_13_03_title_s    = 突破的感受・转
|vo_13_03_title_t    = 突破的感受・轉
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx_s       = 请告诉我继续变强的秘诀~欸？放心交给你就行？…这怎么行，我也要一起努力！
|vo_13_03_tx_t       = 請告訴我繼續變強的秘訣~欸？放心交給（你/妳）就行？…這怎麼行，我也要一起努力！
|vo_13_03_rm         = Qǐng gàosù wǒ jìxù biàn qiáng de mìjué~ Ei? Fàngxīn jiāo gěi nǐ jiùxíng? ...Zhè zěnme xíng, wǒ yě yào yīqǐ nǔlì!
|vo_13_03_tl         = Please tell me the secret to becoming stronger~ Eh? Don't worry and leave it to you? ...How can I do that, I also want to work hard together!
|vo_13_04_title_s    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_title_t    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx_s       = 和你一起旅行，我才意识到舞台是没有边界的。谢谢你！嘿嘿…好！一起喊出那句咒语吧！三、二、一，&mdash;&mdash;芭芭拉冲呀！
|vo_13_04_tx_t       = 和（你/妳）一起旅行，我才意識到舞臺是沒有邊界的。謝謝（你/妳）！嘿嘿…好！一起喊出那句咒語吧！三、二、一，&mdash;&mdash;芭芭拉衝呀！
